VIII.iv.6.C.4.a
.
Location of Instructions for the Preparation of Awards
The instructions in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 2
concerning the preparation of awards involving readjustment and disability severance pay, generally apply to the preparation of awards under
38 U.S.C. 1151
.
The provisions in this topic apply specifically to the preparation of awards under
38 U.S.C. 1151
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section C - Authorization of Awards Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
